review: I'm extremely happy with the Amazon Fire TV stick. Very easy setup and simple to use!
author: W. McKee, Jr.

review: Easy to install and works well right out of the box.  Much faster access to Amazon Prime than the WII set up I was using.
author: Lou

review: Seems to work well. It is easy to use. I was disappointed to find out I couldn't mirror to my tv. I have a Fire HD. You need a Fire HDX. I wish they would have said that before I bought it.
author: ge2353

review: Finally got it  working, I think.  Very confusing having to use 3 separate remotes to get it going.  Directions could be better is included more detail.  The step of where to find an HTML button, for example was not clear at all.
author: Belle

review: Easy to install. Now just learning to navigate it so it becomes easier for me to use when no one else is around. I think I will love it.
author: Marie Eubanks

review: This thing is awesome. I'm ordering 2 more. Exceeded my expectations.  Super easy setup and very intuitive.
author: Kent Schneider

review: Loads Netflix very fast. Only had a few days. Very impressed so far.
author: joe evans

review: Using the Fire TV Stick saves me from having a laptop sitting next to the TV for running Netflix and Amazon Prime content.  It simply works.
author: Daniel C Fischer
